judges: Before Steen, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Pee Curiam,
The Decree of the Court below in each of the above entitled cases is affirmed on the Adjudication of President Judge Raymond MacNeille; each of the parties to pay their respective costs.
opinions.author: Pee Curiam,

attorneys: Daniel Sherman, with him Paul Weinblatt, for appellants.
L. Irving Tubis, with him Romain G. Hassrick, for appellants.
James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Karl I. Schofield, Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellees.
casebody.head_matter:
Vitacolonna, Appellant, v. Philadelphia.
Argued May 4,1955.
Before Steen, C. J., Stearns, Jones, Bell, Chidsey, Musmanno and Arnold, JJ.
Daniel Sherman, with him Paul Weinblatt, for appellants.
L. Irving Tubis, with him Romain G. Hassrick, for appellants.
James L. Stern, Deputy City Solicitor, with him Karl I. Schofield, Assistant City Solicitor, and Abraham L. Freedman, City Solicitor, for appellees.
June 27, 1955:
